artist: Designer: Hans Juda; Manufacturer: Heal's Fabrics
life_date: Hans Juda, Designer, English; Heal's Fabrics, Manufacturer, London, England, 1948–present
text: Designers in the last third of this century have taken delight in creating images that are not typically associated with textiles, such as this cloth, which was inspired by marbling techniques usually associated with elaborately patterned paper made in Italy and Turkey.
title: Vortex
